name: Kentucky Dash
detailed_description:
Kentucky Dash is an endless autorunner set in the Kentucky area, where you race to run the furthest distance. Backgrounds and the running course are procedurally generated, with obstacles and increasing difficulty to keep you on your toes.



Keep pace in this endless autorunner as you run across horse fences in the Kentucky back country. Clear fence gaps, climb farmhouses and jump from billboards as you race against the clock and our leaderboards. Can you beat your Steam friends and run the longest?



We're always adding characters and each character has a unique load out! Do you want a burst of extra speed or the ability to jump higher? Want to be an ice cream sandwich or a bear? The options are limited for now, but the styles keep changing as our Steam Early Access continues.



Exclusively featuring a soundtrack by Matthew "2 Mello" Hopkins (Read Only Memories, Cerebrawl), you can jump and dash your way through the selected tracks of Midnight Broadcasts Vol 1 and 2.

short_description: Kentucky Dash is an endless autorunner where you race to see who can get the furthest.
